profile.name: David S. Miller
profile.headline: Senior Software Engineer at Red Hat Inc.
profile.summary: Results-driven software engineer with over a decade of experience in Linux kernel development and networking. Proven track record of delivering high-quality solutions on time.

experience.title: Senior Software Engineer
description: Led the development of a new Linux kernel feature for improved networking performance.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to deliver high-quality software products on time and within budget.

experience.title: Freelance Developer
description: Developed and maintained multiple open-source projects, including a popular Linux kernel component.
Provided expert-level support to clients on various Linux-related topics.

experience.title: Open Source Maintainer
description: Maintained and contributed to multiple open-source projects, including a popular networking component.
Collaborated with other maintainers to ensure the smooth operation of these projects.
